activities: WorldCompliance offers a suite of products with access to a comprehensive source of individuals and organizations that pose a potential risk to the financial system. It contains greater than 2.5MM entities across multiple segments (Sanctions & Enforcements, Politically Exposed Persons, Adverse Media and State Owned Entities).  We monitor over 32,000 television, magazine, newspaper & websites via automated methods to ensure that we are providing clients with the most accurate and up-to-date information possible. Additionally, we have over 1,500 automatic alerts set up for government agency and sanctioning body websites to immediately notify us of updates. All of our information is backed by open source data, and URLS are provided to allow the user to locate the primary source of our information.  This certification applies to personal information received from WorldCompliance customers in the EU/EEA.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually processed. Certification only applies to data received from WorldCompliance customers
privacyprograms: We adhere to AICPA Generally Accepted Privacy Principles and we also have a self-regulatory privacy program in place that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
